Lawrence.Phillips Academy: Phillips Academy Andover (also known as Andover, or PA) is a co-educational university-preparatory school for boarding and day students in grades 9–12, along with a post-graduate (PG) year. The school is in Andover, Massachusetts, United States, 25 miles north of Boston. Phillips Academy has 1,150 students, and is a selective school, accepting 13% of applicants.
